name: tumultuous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
very loud, or full of confusion, change, or uncertainty: The former president appeared to tumultuous applause and a standing ovation. After the tumultuous events of 1990, Europe was completely transformed. Synonyms
riotous
troubled
turbulent
